programme.title: Law & Order: Special Victims Unit
programme.desc: A 15-year-old with a sexually transmitted disease says he caught it from his teacher (Melissa Joan Hart); Benson and Stabler uncover dark secrets while searching into the pair's lives.

programme.title: Jaws
programme.desc: A New England police chief (Roy Scheider), a shark hunter (Robert Shaw) and a scientist (Richard Dreyfuss) have a showdown with a huge white shark.

programme.title: Resident Alien
programme.desc: Harry has to prove himself to someone from his past.

programme.title: Law & Order: Special Victims Unit
programme.desc: The dismembered body of a woman is found in a junkyard, and detectives must determine who killed her and who attempted to harvest organs from her corpse.

programme.title: Law & Order: Special Victims Unit
programme.desc: A serial pedophile murders members of a family and kidnaps the two younger children.

programme.title: Law & Order: Special Victims Unit
programme.desc: When a coed dependent upon financial aid is found dead with a large sum of cash, detectives suspect her wealthy roommate.

programme.title: Law & Order: Special Victims Unit
programme.desc: A woman believes her young son was molested by her husband; an online pedophile site is investigated.

programme.title: Law & Order: Special Victims Unit
programme.desc: An unstable woman stops taking medication and mows down 10 people with her car; a former rock star wages an anti-psychiatric-drug campaign.
The members of the 118 are called to a series of emergencies around Christmas Eve; Eddie struggles with an emotional Christopher.

Athena, Bobby and the 118 must rescue a family whose pick-up truck has been rigged with a pipe bomb that will detonate if the vehicle slows down and goes under 55 mph; Eddie has a rough transition into his new job; Buck makes a relationship decision.
Chimney is determined to find a missing Maddie amongst the chaos of St. Patrick's Day.

Athena investigates a robbery at a gas station; Bobby and the 126 race to rescue a novice diver who panics while in a shark cage; Eddie reaches his breaking point; Maddie shares some news with Buck, who realizes he has to come clean with Taylor.

The members of the 118 race into action when a women falls over her balcony; Athena investigates when a bike rider is impaled on a stop sign; Eddie begins his therapy for his PTSD and survivor's guilt; Maddie fears the worst when Jee-Yun falls ill.

When a blimp suffers mechanical failure and its engine catches fire, Athena and the 118 must rescue victims both inside and outside a packed sports stadium; Bobby and Athena drop off May on her first day of college and discuss honeymoon plans.

The 118 race to the rescue when a structure collapses at a convention; Athena's father suffers a stroke; Hen stretches herself too thin with test prep and her new responsibilities at the 118; Maddie tries to help new recruit get his bearings.
While in Florida caring for her ailing father, Athena and Bobby investigate the disappearance of her childhood friend from 45 years ago.

The 118 races to the rescue when a birdwatcher is trapped under a tree; Chimney is in for a wild ride when he tends to a drunken driver; Maddie helps a mother and her young daughter when an abusive father shows up at the their house.

Athena investigates when the same house is hit with two home invasion 911 calls within hours of each other; the 118 race to the rescue when a man is trapped in an attic; Hen asks for a second chance with her medical school professor.
Hen fears for Karen's life when an explosion rocks her science lab on the day she brings Denny to work with her.

programme.title: Chicago P.D.

programme.title: Chicago P.D.

programme.title: Chicago P.D.
